starwars.userinterfaces

Class TextInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • starwars.userinterfaces.TextInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapRenderer, MessageRenderer, SimulationController

    public class TextInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageRenderer, MapRenderer, SimulationController
    IMPORTANT This UI is no longer required and is not compatible with the controller. Needs to be deleted! - Asel

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextInterface

        public TextInterface(SWWorld world)
        Constructor for the Text Interface

        This text interface can be used to display messages, grid and obtain user input in the Text Console

        Parameters:
        world - The world being considered by the Text Interface
